channel.title: Question: Jonin Ascension
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Question: Jonin Ascension" - how to unlock Jonin Ascension mission?

item.title: Re: Question: Jonin Ascension
item.content:encoded: When you get the Sword of the Reaper your level is reduced by 6. So they took the Jonin exam at 41, then got the Sword and had their level reduced to 35.

item.title: Re: Question: Jonin Ascension
item.content:encoded: then why r there lvl 35,36….40 jonins??? how could they become jonins?

item.title: Re: Question: Jonin Ascension
item.content:encoded: When it says you need to be over level 40, it means you need to be at least level 41.

item.title: Question: Jonin Ascension
item.content:encoded:
i got this mission is special missions but i cant do it… it writes
"Special Mission Hint: To become a Jonin is rare. You must complete a mission that distinguishes you from other ninja. Ninja expecting to become Jonin should be over Level 40, and a member of a Village with a Jonin Council."
i m lvl 40 n member of village vith Jonin Council… so where's the problem??? what mission i have to done to unlock it???
